actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to permit certain Indian tribes to qualify as prime sponsors under title I of that act.

summary.text: Revises the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to permit any recognized Indian tribal organization to qualify as a prime sponsor under that Act, and to make any recognized Indian tribal organization an eligible applicant for Federal financial aid under that Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to permit certain Indian tribes to qualify as prime sponsors under title I of that act.
